text: Aeronautical Engineering Review was a journal published by the Institute of the Aeronautical Sciences. ==History== The Institute of the Aeronautical Sciences started on 1933. It was titled the Journal of the Aeronautical Sciences. It became a monthly publication in 1935. The journal contained a section called "News from the Institute", that contained meeting notices, announcements, and obituaries. By 1944 this information was transferred to the Aeronautical Engineering Review.The IAS - Later Years (1945 to 1963) . AIAA. 2012. ==References== Category:Aerospace engineering journals Category:Defunct journals of the United States Category:Publications established in 1933
title: Aeronautical Engineering Review
